channel.title: Container on Sequr
channel.description: Recent content in Container on Sequr

item.title: Home Assistant Container Part 2: Home Assistant Container
item.description: In this second part of the Home Assistant Container series we’ll set up the Home Assistant Container using docker-compose.

item.title: Home Assistant Container Part 1: Install Debian, Docker and Portainer
item.description: In this first part of the Home Assistant Container series we’ll install Debian, set up Docker and docker-compose, and install Portainer.
